at.ac.tuwien.infosys.jcloudscale.classLoader.caching.cache

Class FileCacheManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • at.ac.tuwien.infosys.jcloudscale.classLoader.caching.cache.CacheManagerAbstract
      • at.ac.tuwien.infosys.jcloudscale.classLoader.caching.cache.FileCacheManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICacheManager, Closeable, AutoCloseable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    NoCacheManager

    public class FileCacheManager
extends CacheManagerAbstract
    Author:
    rst Cache manager that stores all information in the file system. Special folder is created on the server and all code provided by clients is stored there. New requests will offer client already available code in cache. If client agrees that the version of the code offered is correct, server uses this code without transmitting it over network. However, note that cache is local to the machine and each machine will maintain its own cache.

      • getClassesWithFiles

        public String[] getClassesWithFiles(String itemName)
        Description copied from interface: ICacheManager
        Gets the list of classes that have additional files within the item.
        Parameters:
        itemName - The name of the item that classes with additional files should be related to.
        Returns:
        The list of the classes that have items within specified item. If the offer is not registered or no files within this offer, returns null.

      • getClassBytecode

        public byte[] getClassBytecode(String className,
                      String itemName)
        Description copied from interface: ICacheManager
        Gets the bytecode of the specified class if it is registered in the cache.
        Parameters:
        className - The name of the class to retrieve bytecode for.
        itemName - The name of the item that should contain the specified class
        Returns:
        The bytecode that represents the specified class. If the class cannot be found, null

      • deployFile

        public boolean deployFile(String fileName,
                 String offerName)
        Description copied from interface: ICacheManager
        Deploys the specified file from the cache to the correct location.
        Parameters:
        fileName - The name of the file to deploy
        offerName - The name of the offer where this file was registered.
        Returns:
        true if file was registered successfully. Otherwise, (if exception occurred) -- false. Question is what to do if such file exists and it is different from ours. Now we overwrite.
